dialogues.speaker: Jack
dialogues.speech: H-hi, were you from the tanker too?

dialogues.speaker: Jack
dialogues.speech: O-oh, sorry boss. I'm glad to see you though. How are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.speech: Besides losing my gun and my radio, I'm just peachy. How bout you kid?

dialogues.speaker: Jack
dialogues.speech: Well, I'm ok I think. My head hurts from the explosion though.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.speech: Yes, we set up camp about 2 hours away from here. How the hell did you wash up here so far away from everyone else?

dialogues.speaker: Jack
dialogues.speech: I'm not too sure... I remembering grabbing on something and just swim towards the island.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.speech: Well, it's too late to go back now. It's getting dark. Let's set up camp here and we'll go to the group tomorrow morning.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.speech: Why don't you go around and pick up some wood for the fire? About 8 logs should be enough. Just press E to pick them up.
